title: Silver 3 Looking for a good Silver Jungler/Mid
body:
Hey, I'm a silver 3 player (currently) that's looking for a player with a positive kda in their matches and/or a positive winrate in their games. I picked up a new champ and dropped to Silver 3 from Silver 1. I started playing Mid Ezreal and for the most part do pretty well in lane and in late game, but I feel like AP Ezreal needs a pretty team dependent champ. 

I'm dropping my AP Ezreal for now, I can get back up to S1 easily but I'm seeing how important playing with competent team players are. 

I really would like to play with players that are calm and collected.

replies.body: How come posting in OCE boards? are you OCE? (says you're NA) if you are, add my IGN: FieryShadowz
